description: Doctoral Musical Arts degree at University of Arizona are awarded to candidates who display deep understanding of the subject matter of their disciplines as well as the ability to make original contributions to knowledge in their fields.

The Architecture program form Okan University aims to provide students with the current debates, basic theoretical approaches and current knowledge in the fields of architecture history and theories, construction management, design methods and building technologies.

The Musical Arts - Composition degree at University of Arizona can be earned with emphases in music education, music theory, or musicology.  According to the National Association of Schools of Music, graduate education in music should foster and develop  those talents, interests, and philosophies that preserve and extend our cultural heritage

university: University at Buffalo SUNY - School of Engineering and Applied Sciences
description: The Materials Design and Innovation department from the University at Buffalo SUNY - School of Engineering and Applied Sciences emphasizes a data driven perspective of materials discovery and design.

The Doctor of Fine Arts from University of Auckland  is an advanced studio-based research degree, encompassing research and practice. DocFA study is an opportunity to make a significant contribution to the field of contemporary art and/or design.

The History and Theory of Arts study program at Kaunas University of Technology in theory and critics of arts is realized within interdisciplinary context with focus on three areas: theory and history of architecture, musicology.

In accordance with the original mission of the Pécs Doctoral School, heritage protection has been and will be one of the main focus areas of its activities in this Architecture - Architectural Engineering from University of Pécs.

Students of Music - Theory degree at University of Arizona work individually with faculty members in small seminars and tutorials, in informal studio and coaching sessions, and in intensive consultations relating to the preparation of theses, dissertations, and performance projects.

course: Art History and Education - Art History
description: The Art History and Education - Art History program from University of Arizona provides an interdisciplinary, theoretically informed, methodologically diverse two track PhD program: with one track in Art History and one in Art and Visual Culture Education.

Part of 4TU Stan Ackermans Institute, like a doctoral candidate, at the Process and Product Design programme at Eindhoven University of Technology (TU/e) you will have the status of TU/e employee if you are selected for one of these programs. The programs start with a year of advanced education, followed by a major design project of eight to twelve months in a company.

The Civil Engineering programme aims to educate the best qualified scientists and educators of civil engineering for Kaunas University of Technology and other institutions of higher education; to prepare researchers, who are able to carry out actual problem-solving oriented research in the construction area, for the companies and administrations of construction sector.

Designer in Bioprocess Engineering programme from Delft University of Technology (TU Delft) develops MSc graduates from (bio-)chemical engineering, or related academic backgrounds, into multidisciplinary specialists, in preparation for a career in the industry.

PhD’s in Industrial Design from Eindhoven University of Technology (TU/e) are looking for and interested in design research challenges. The main objective of these challenges is to create value and opportunities in systems with emerging technologies and materials.

The Musical Arts - Performance degree at University of Arizona has emphases in composition, conducting, and performance. In the performance emphasis concentrations are available in bassoon, cello, clarinet, double bass, euphonium, flute, guitar, horn, harp, harpsichord, oboe, organ, percussion, piano, saxophone, trombone, trumpet, tuba, viola, violin, and voice.

This programme offers a doctoral-level programme in Music for students who wish to engage in high-quality research in selected areas of the discipline. In addition, the PhD/MLitt in Music includes a number of generic and specific skills modules that will complement its research-oriented elements as part of a structured research programme at Maynooth University.

The Musical Arts - Conducting degree at University of Arizona can be earned with emphases in music education, music theory, or musicology.  According to the National Association of Schools of Music, graduate education in music should foster and develop those talents, interests, and philosophies that preserve and extend our cultural heritage.
Human-Centered Computing at University of Maryland Baltimore County is the discipline that explores human interaction with information technologies and the use of these technologies to improve lives.

The PhD in Design, Architecture and Building from University of Technology Sydney is a University-wide degree which involves an intense period of supervised study and research, culminating in the submission of a thesis.
The Fine Arts and Art Conservation programme is offered by the Pedagogical University of Krakow - the oldest and highest-ranking pedagogical university in Poland.

The Architecture program from Yasar University aims to cultivate scholars who formulate and conduct original scientific research in the field of Architecture and sub-research areas such as History of Architecture, Theory and Criticism, Cultural Studies, Environmental Control and Building Technology, Building Information, Urban Design.

The Doctoral Program in Naval Architecture and Ocean Engineering from Instituto Superior Técnico is integrated in the 3rd cycle of studies following the Bologna Agreement as a complement of the first and second cycles in Naval Architecture and Ocean Engineering.

The Architecture programme from Instituto Superior Técnico is structured in the framework of a wide-ranging understanding about the processes of production and use of the built space at both the urban and the building scale.
The Urban and Regional Development Phd programme jointly activated by Politecnico di Torino and Università degli Studi di Torino.

This Architectural and Landscape Heritage programme from Politecnico di Torin focuses on heritage, with a view to promoting both knowledge, management and conservation of building environment, and qualification and innovation/transformation processes, compatible with existing environment in order to qualify it, keeping in mind the role assumed by communications.
This Management, Production and Design PhD programme from Politecnico di Torino focuses on several research areas, corresponding to several specific production activities.

The architectural composition and technology favour the interpretation of projects as a means to explore the interplay between different theories, technical innovations and changes in urban environment. The Architecture - History and Project programme is offered by Politecnico di Torino.

Process and Equipment Design programme from Delft University of Technology (TU Delft) is a dream come true for aspiring engineers. But also for technological companies. They need people with more than just a MSc degree.
The Music degree at University of Arizona can be earned with emphases in music education, music theory, or musicology.

Arts at University of Auckland is a globally recognised postgraduate research degree and the highest level of degree you can achieve. PhD students are critical, curious, creative thinkers who undertake original research over at least 3 years.
If you're looking to take your skills in art and design into postgraduate research, the Art, Design and Performance degree programme from University of Portsmouth can help you achieve your ambitions.

Part of 4TU Stan Ackermans Institute, the Smart Buildings and Cities programme from Eindhoven University of Technology (TU/e) is a two-year post-master technological designer program. The SB&C program wants to contribute to the transition towards smart, intelligent and sustainable cities where quality of life is high.
If you're ready to take your expertise in Film, Media and Communication into a postgraduate research qualification, look no further than University of Portsmouth.

The Art History and Education PhD from University of Arizona offers comprehensive studies of the history of art and architecture through critical engagement with existing scholarship and art historical theories and methods.
The Music - Music Education degree at University of Arizona can be earned with emphases in music education, music theory, or musicology.
